title: 'Anyone who runs is shot': Watch Russian soldiers describe killings of troops who refuse orders
summary_full: The men, who are on the run, told of the horrors they witnessed on the Russian side of the front lines in Ukraine.
summary_public: The men, who are on the run, told of the horrors they witnessed on the Russian side of the front lines in Ukraine.
